name: 10 from 3′
description: Make 10 putts from 3 feet

name: 10 from 5′
description: Make 10 putts from 5 feet

name: 10 from 8′
description: Make 10 putts from 8 feet

name: 10 from 20′ → 3′
description: Get 10 putts from 20 feet within 3 feet of the hole

name: 10 from 30′ → 3′
description: Get 10 putts from 30 feet within 3 feet of the hole

name: 10 from 45′ → 5′
description: Get 10 putts from 45 feet within 5 feet of the hole

name: Killer
description: Make consecutive putts without missing or start over

name: Overtake game
description: Competitive putting game to overtake opponent's score

name: 3-foot compass (out of 36)
description: Putt from 12 positions around 3-foot circle, 3 putts each position

name: 6-foot compass (out of 36)
description: Putt from 12 positions around 6-foot circle, 3 putts each position

name: Par-18 putting
description: 18-hole putting course challenge

name: 100′ drill
description: Long distance putting practice from 100 feet

name: Decade distance
description: Putting practice at 10, 20, 30, 40, 50 foot distances

name: 10 from 30′ → 3′
description: Chip 10 balls from 30 feet to within 3 feet of pin
5 chips from 5 different lies to 5 different pins

name: Par-18 chipping challenge
description: 18-hole chipping course with par targets

name: Alignment-stick pitches
description: Practice pitching using alignment sticks for proper setup

name: 10 from 30 yd on green
description: Hit 10 pitch shots from 30 yards to land on green

name: 10 from 50 yd on green
description: Hit 10 pitch shots from 50 yards to land on green

name: 10 from 75 yd on green
description: Hit 10 pitch shots from 75 yards to land on green

name: 10 from 100 yd on green
description: Hit 10 pitch shots from 100 yards to land on green

name: Towel-connection drill
description: Practice iron swing with towel under arms for connection

name: Feet-together rotation
description: Practice swing rotation with feet together

name: Single-leg drill
description: Practice balance and rotation on single leg

name: Alignment parallel & perpendicular
description: Setup practice with alignment sticks in parallel and perpendicular positions

name: 5 draws
description: Hit 5 controlled draw shots with irons

name: 5 fades
description: Hit 5 controlled fade shots with irons

name: PW on line (out of 5)
description: Hit 5 pitching wedge shots on target line

name: 7-iron on line (out of 5)
description: Hit 5 seven-iron shots on target line

name: 5-iron on line (out of 5)
description: Hit 5 five-iron shots on target line
